Subject: Undelete job reports?

I'm a new Heritrix user, and I'm using Heritrix 1.14.2.  In the web
gui, I =
was clicking through the reports (on the Jobs page, under
Completed Jobs), =
curious to see what each report provided. 
Unfortunately, I was careless, a=
nd clicked on the last link (Delete)
before I realized what it was.

I ssh'=
ed onto the box, and it appears all of the info for the job is
still there =
under $HERITRIX_HOME/jobs.  I see state.job contains the
word "Deleted".  I=
 tried changing this to be "Finished", but the job
still does not appear in=
 the web gui.

Is there a way to undelete a job's reports, so I can view th=
em again
through the web gui?

Thanks!
